DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial enhance usual care treatment control . The aim determine effect journaling use resource website weight loss . There two group 55 participant . The intervention condition ask record daily weight , physical activity step take pre-portioned food item complete two daily journaling activity . Participants also receive weekly tracing data , weekly blog principal investigator access weight control website . The control group access tracking , journaling website three month . Investigators hypothesize website paired track journaling effective help participant lose weight .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants call study line give recruitment material screen phone . Baseline visit : Individuals meet screen criterion invite one-hour training session website diet plan book . During training , coordinator review consent form participant ask question . The coordinator take consented individual ' height , weight blood pressure measurement . Participants give pedometer use physical activity meal replacement book use resource . After baseline visit : All participant complete survey online ( Demographics , Three-Factor Eating Questionnaire , Motivation , Weight Loss Habits , Medication log , International Physical Activity Questionnaire ) randomize one two group . The intervention group ask record weight , physical activity step , pre-portioned food item journal entry daily basis . The control group send email inform access tracking , journal website three month . Intervention Group : Participants receive daily email link record weight , physical activity step pre-portioned food item ; participant also complete journaling response two writing prompt . The email contain link website use resource . Every week , participant enter whether appointment primary care provider next week . Participants also receive weekly blog principal investigator ; participant opt receive blog emails time . Coordinators review database weekly . If participant lose ten pound , email call doctor since weight loss affect blood pressure medication need . If participant upcoming primary care provider appointment , email print track graph ( weight , step take , meal replacement ) . Coordinators also monitor journal response ; coordinator contact participant write useful entry ask participant 's response share participant . Shared post anonymous ; age individual give . Month one two visit : Participants group ask come Hershey Medical Center height , weight blood pressure measure . Month three visit : Participants group ask come Hershey Medical Center height , weight blood pressure measure . Prior visit , participant ask complete series survey online ( Three-Factor Eating Questionnaire , Motivation , Weight Loss Habits , Medication log , International Physical Activity Questionnaire , Satisfaction ) . Participants control group give booklet contain write prompt , track website address complete choose . Participants ask would like come back optional video interview . The interview consist six question experience study .
DOC.criteria: 21 65 year old Body mass index 27 45 Email Internet access Able read , write , understand English Weight loss 5 % current body weight previous 6 month Participated weight loss research previous 6 month Current use weight loss medication program History schedule weight loss surgery Heart , liver , kidney failure Been tell doctor heart trouble Frequent pain heart chest Often feel faint spell severe dizziness Bone joint problem might aggravate exercise Physical reason follow activity program History sever cognitive impairment major psychiatric illness Pregnant previous 6 month , currently plan become pregnant next 3 month Moving next 6 month
